commands.description: Creates a copy of a remote repository on your local machine.
Stages changes for the next commit.
Records the staged changes in the repository.
Displays the state of the working directory and staging area.
Uploads local commits to a remote repository.
Fetches and merges changes from a remote repository to your local branch.
Switches branches or restores working tree files.
Shows the commit history for the repository.
Resets the current HEAD to a specified state.
Retrieves updates from a remote repository without merging.
Temporarily saves changes that are not ready to be committed.
Fetches and merges changes from the main branch of the origin remote.
Creates a new branch named 'develop' and switches to it.
